item.title: Inaugural pgCMH mtg scheduled
item.description: As announced on our Twitter, we’ve scheduled our inaugural meeting for Jan 24, 2017 at 1800 hrs.

item.title: Announcing pgCMH
item.description: I’ve been kicking around the idea of founding a Columbus-based PostgreSQL User Group for a while now.
